# chai-recipe

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of chai-recipe is to share a simple recipe Shiny app for making
chai. The general process can be applied to any recipe you commonly
revisit or would like to share.

## Run the app

In RStudio IDE:

``` r
shiny::runGitHub("chai-recipe", "parmsam", "master")
```

Or via Shinylive by pasting [this
link](https://shinylive.io/r/app/#-daEDFaWiF2pVINjIegBSZgYWjAoQYHqtACMiDYFG0-lecFuKla1zR7jEAF8xJ5aDMNkowgBVACSYj0HHubSgLliG30TiBEG+DRyhVwXz8HFIiIAClAIHA2ECwF5YAByO4AYXkUFpMgpEGYHBFfjgUBUtB4sw4qDCBCgbAIenmpCIPHGPPZtBSPC4tQ4MAAKnAAB6kADyS1QSwl8CEQgZcBhGN56WYcGdPHoUCkREDvO+0dj-GFovFqe+P04MZ4qoDpDZefLtB65tuMNz5Z6ADlzlxUrQiBtaHKqqI8HW80M7RW8zAlI0B33vp1PY0AByDoc--edI9aj6MZLQABUR23LQdCAbkFN3O2PX46eFNth25BQLm82vjw9x9jIsK0NEKNox+urk7DVO0DTdOs7QXPkDzzPVrL7O5uzsSIlAKRw5EfZDLQAD0tD6+L3aSwL7O-EQ+wq9q7DatrbStsrDOq0em3aPwdIC0bJsy9TQF+FAXCIlbNsMx7XtK8drvarmYUQC4PPFD7xtk-7UuB5bqDWxZssJ0nTs8y7bNx0eymwEQMDe+nEt0ALFcwFXRcs7HHPl0o0BN+yUR9qnft15ntPZ7n9MdgQneV+y0eoLb7e5sD0lfW4dItXAxF5j0IDy6kuKtx2O82pdQ5byObB3nvJeM+fM1XiA6ua9re8j-F7xt-bWvCG2PPs20RDzYWW+m8wAgEjjwZ+wdQ451frqCOehPZHz0lvAuu8tRQDDi8N+HYUGIL7FvCeEAu4kGftqDBchYHj0nt3WgMgVrPFNGoY+FYbp3RyD0B6EB2EeVzPqUgegeAvEXjJNwz1XoEkykSEysxXI-RLEVAqJVnLSPMjrQaNUeAem9NDd2bw6QEA3t8HovQiArDltzIBhiwAAEFmCsF-o-YQrQcGtBFKwRuVcLGVjAMY0xYFaDBxSmnEcZxyA9iQdY2x18Dpqh+PA-gnijEmLYJsa0-iuCBNyJEfojMQnCASZKUgfBRwhDQbQf4T4JauJOhAAAVkQKQXDyzPW+EouKediioHQeQf8MgjgnDOBcK4bxUToj0t+cZ3xiBsHmLcMIbDUKPWaYNPhAiZCtNcqIiY+JOGTFoFgbY-j0BiAUEoKQVj0AyBpI0GkmIoo8xyLdHgjojBgFxAAXSAA)
